document.title: [PSN] Mise a jour hebdo du 23/05/2012
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (23/05/2012) sur le PlayStation Network / Sony Entertainment Network (PSN/SEN) :
Nouveaux contenus PlayStation Network PlayStation Plus Ghost Recon Future Soldier Signature Edition (PS3) – 15% de réduction jusqu’au 20 juin Jeux (PS3) Alex Kidd in Miracle World – 4,49€ – PEGI 7 – 66 Mo Dirt Showdown (sortie le vendredi 25 mai) – Le VIP Pass est inclus – 59,99 € – PEGI 7 – 4298 Mo Dr Who : The Eternity Clock – 17,99€ – PEGI 12 – 1510 Mo Ghost Recon Future Soldier Signature Editio n – 69,99€ – PEGI 18
Monster World IV – 4,49€ – PEGI 7 – 92 Mo Order Up !! – 11,25€ – PEGI 3 – 1029 Mo Sorcery – 39,99€ – PEGI 12
Super Hang-On – 4,49€ – PEGI 3 – 69 Mo The Revenge of Shinobi – 4,49€ – PEGI 12 – 85 Mo Wonder Boy in Monster Land – 4,49€ – PEGI 3 – 65 Mo Wonder Boy in Monster World – 4,49€ – PEGI 7 – 93 Mo Démos (PS3) Batman : Arkham City – PEGI 16 – 1344 Mo Ridge Racer Unbounded – PEGI 7 – 669 Mo Sorcery – PEGI 12 – 610 Mo Jeux (PS Vita) Table Top Tanks – 1,99€ – PEGI 7 – 135 Mo Démos (PS Vita) A-Men – PEGI 12 PS2 Conflict : Desert Storm II – 6,99€ – PEGI 16 – 2076 Mo Contenus téléchargeables (PS3) Dirt Showdown – VIP Pass – 7,99€ – PEGI 7 Dragon’s Dogma – PEGI 18
A Coiffure You Can’t Refuse – 1,99€ From A Different Sky – Part 1 – 0,99€ Rift Crystal Pack – 0,99€
Dungeon Defenders – Quest for the Lost Eternia Shards Part III – 3,99€ – PEGI 12 Motorstorm RC (compatible PS Vita) – PEGI 3
Special Supermini: Mirage Mariner – 0,25€ Special Race Truck: Ozutsu Outboard – Gratuit pendant 7 jours Veteran Monster Truck: Beelzebuggy Bombadier – 0,49€
Pure Chess – Pure Chess Forest – 1,99€ – PEGI 3 Rock Band 3 – Maiden Epics – 7,99€ – PEGI 12 – Inclus les morceaux suivants également disponibles séparément :
Flight Of Icarus – 1,49€ Infinite Dreams – 1,49€ Phantom Of The Opera – 1,49€ Rime Of The Ancient Mariner – 1,49€ Seventh Son Of A Seventh Son – 1,49€ The Prisoner – 1,49€
Rock Band Network – PEGI 12
Amazing Horse – 0,79€ Thug Love – 0,79€ Valleys – 1,49€ Kitty Fight Song – 0,79€ No Holy Man – 0,79€
Saints Row The Third – Penthouse Pack – 2,49€ – PEGI 18 Soul Calibur V – PEGI 16
Active Wear 2 – 1,99€ Cepheus Compatibility Pack 4 Hairstyles 1 – 1,99€ SCV Character Equipment 2 – 1,99€ Skeleton Costumes 1 – 0,99€
Warriors Orochi 3 – Stage Pack 2 – 2,99€ – PEGI 12 Contenus téléchargeables (PS Vita) Hustle Kings – Trickshot Pack – 1,99€ – PEGI 3 Motorstorm RC (compatible PS3) – PEGI 3
Special Supermini: Mirage Mariner – 0,25€ Special Race Truck: Ozutsu Outboard – Gratuit pendant 7 jours Veteran Monster Truck: Beelzebuggy Bombadier – 0,49€
Ridge Racer – MACHINE SKIN : KAMATA SYNCi – 1,49€ – PEGI 3 Table Top Tanks – Toy Tanks Set – 0,99€ – PEGI 7 Soundtracks Sorcery Soundtrack – 4,99€ Avatars The Studio Avatars – Hydro74 Avatar Bundle – 1,19€
Hydro74 Avatar 1 – 0,25€ Hydro74 Avatar 2 – 0,25€ Hydro74 Avatar 3 – 0,25€ Hydro74 Avatar 4 – 0,25€ Hydro74 Avatar 5 – 0,25€ Hydro74 Avatar 6 – 0,25€
Oddworld : Stranger’s Wrath HD
Clacker – 0,25€ Oddworld Moon – 0,25€ Sekto – 0,25€ Steef – 0,25€ Stranger – 0,25€
Themes PSP Studio Skulls Static Theme by Grafitti Kings – 0,99€ PS3 Studio Skulls Static Theme by Grafitti Kings – 1,99€ Jeux Phineas and Ferb Theme – 2,99€ Nature Dynamic Bacteria Theme Two – 1,99€ Lieux Dynamic Chicago Night Theme – 1,99€ Dynamic Golden Gate Bridge Theme – 1,99€ Dynamic Brooklyn Bridge NYC Theme – 1,99€ Sci-Fi/FantasyY Dynamic Ghost In Television Theme – 1,99€ Sport Dynamic Winter Olympic Theme – 1,99€ Vidéos FIFA 12 Uefa Euro 2012 Expedition Trailer Uefa Euro 2012 Launch Trailer
Wahou ! L’arrivée d’ Alex Kidd cette semaine me donne des envies, je pense qu’on va craquer sur ce titre avec Offblink 😉
